name: FindMyPhoneandKeys
0:
”Alexa, ask Pebblebee to find my keys.”
”Alexa, ask Pebblebee to find my phone.”
”Alexa, ask Pebblebee to locate my keys.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pebblebee
des:
Ever misplace your phone or keys? Thanks to the Pebblebee skill, you can now simply ask Alexa to find your keys and she'll quickly ring your Pebblebee Finder device attached to your keys.

Alexa can also help you find your phone even if it's on vibrate!

You can purchase the Pebblebee Finder on Amazon or at www.pebblebee.com/finder

To get started, install the free Pebblebee app and follow these simple Alexa skill instructions:

1. Install the Pebblebee App from the Apple App store (https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pebblebee-app/id1052309602).

2. Enable the Find My Phone and Keys skill by Pebblebee from your Alexa app or by asking "Alexa, enable the Find My Phone and Keys skill".

3. Link your Pebblebee account to Alexa in the Alexa app.

4. Tag a device to use with Alexa in device settings under "Voice Tag", i.e. "Keys".

5. Say, "Alexa, ask Pebblebee to find my keys" or "Alexa, ask Pebblebee to locate my keys" or "Alexa, ask Pebblebee to find my phone".

Finding made easy! What's lost is found.
